## GoJelastic configure

Configure your CLI

### Synopsis

Configure your CLI

```
GoJelastic configure [flags]
```

### Examples

```
jelastic configure --token=your_token --url=your_url
```

### Options

```
  -h, --help           help for configure
      --token string   Your Jelastic token
      --url string     Your Jelastic url
```
